name: Archer
description: You joined the army as an archer, manning walls and front lines in times of war.

exploits.name: Long shot
exploits.description: You have an eye for distance. You can double the range increment of a bow.

exploits.name: Bowyer
exploits.description: You know how to maintain your equipment. One standard quality bow becomes a high quality weapon, as long as you spend an hour maintaining it every day.

exploits.name: Careful aim
exploits.description: When aiming, your bonus to hit increases to +2d6.

exploits.name: Rapid shot
exploits.description: Your rate of fire increases; once per turn you can fire two shots instead of one.

exploits.name: Stand your ground
exploits.description: As long as you do not move, you can plant arrows in the ground and loose two shots every action.

exploits.name: Double shot
exploits.description: You notch two arrows and let both fly simultaneously. Each must be directed at a different target, and both targets must be within 10' of each other. You cannot combine this ability with any other exploits.

exploits.name: Intercepting shot
exploits.description: You can shoot another arrow out of the sky as a reaction. Roll an opposed attack roll against that of the attacker's arrow; if you succeed, the arrow is split and falls harmlessly to the ground.
